name: Impact Juggling
description:
What better sport to embody the loop than juggling? All you are doing is throwing balls in the air, over and over and over and over ...

Don't drop any balls, and don't forget to collect the point hoops neither, or you'll regret it*. And most importantly: don't forget to share your highscore!

*loose a life, that is.

Controls

Move: A / D or Left Arrow / Right Arrow

Aim: Mouse

Hit Ball: Left Click or Space
